trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Hebron
There were no other sightings in Hebron on or around August 15th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsWas letting our dogs out to use the restroom and saw a sauser shaped craft that was covered in a yellow energy with a hint of red.Viewed the craft for about 15 mintues then it just took off at a speed that I am not able to calculate.My wife witnessed this event through the kitchen widow.
Summary: Was letting our dogs out to use the restroom before we went to bed and while I was toileting them I looked up between my neighbors houses and saw a plasma looking sauser shape craft that was full of a yellow energy and with a red glow in the center
